body:
Hi, I'm the colorist. 
This series updates every 2 weeks with the average of 4 pages per update.
Want proof, look up Zuel32. Hope y'all enjoy the rest of the color work

I didn't like the art. Actually the very character design of this girl just doesn't light up anything. How can someone design a character that doesn't look like a slutty taimanin ninja is beyond me. Maybe the author should collaborate with Taimanins and make naruto great again.
